name: Finance Weekly Reports
query:
select A.report_type "Report Type:150", A.root_type "Root type:150", G.posting_date AS "Date:Link/Account:150" , G.medical_department , G.account  AS "Account:Link/Account:150" , 
count(G.account) as Total ,sum(G.credit)  As "Revenue:Currency:120"   ,  sum(G.debit) As "Expense:Currency:120", 
sum(G.credit)  - sum(G.debit)     AS "Balance:Link/Account:100"  from `tabGL Entry`  as G , `tabAccount` as A
where  posting_date >= %(from_date)s
and posting_date <= %(to_date)s
and G.account = A.name
and A.report_type = 'Profit and Loss'
and A.company = 'Somali Sudanese Specialized Hospital'
group by G.account,A.report_type, A.root_type , G.posting_date, G.medical_department 
ORDER BY A.root_type desc;
